scripts.build: cross-env node_modules/.bin/bz-def && npm run setup && npm run define && npm run production && npm run bundle && npm run clear
scripts.setup: cross-env node_modules/.bin/cpr package.json ./build/package.json && cross-env node_modules/.bin/cpr Readme.md ./build/README.md
scripts.define: npm run define:clear && npm run define:copy && cross-env node_modules/.bin/rimraf def
scripts.clear: cross-env node_modules/.bin/rimraf build/node_modules && cross-env node_modules/.bin/rimraf build/def && cross-env node_modules/.bin/rimraf build/actions.js && cross-env node_modules/.bin/rimraf build/package.json && cross-env node_modules/.bin/rimraf build/README.md && cross-env node_modules/.bin/rimraf def
